properties.areaDesc: Pulaski, VA; City of Radford, VA; Montgomery, VA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 2:50PM EST until February 8 at 9:15AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Flood Warnings continues for the following locations along the New River in Virginia...

New River at Allisonia affecting Pulaski and Wythe Counties

New River At Radford affecting City of Radford...Montgomery and
Pulaski Counties

Several inches of rain fell across the region yesterday into
this morning. Excessive runoff continues across the region
resulting in minor to moderate flooding along the New River
and its tributaries.

The National Weather Service in Blacksburg, VA has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the New River at Radford
* through Saturday morning.
* At 2 PM EDT this afternoon the stage was 14.7 feet...and very
slowly rising.
* Flood Stage is 14.0 feet. Moderate flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast
to continue into Saturday.
* The river will continue rising to near 14.9 feet this evening.
* Impact...at 14.0 feet...Riverside parking lots are affected
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 15.8
feet on Feb 24 2019.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
